headline: A BLM Activist Who is Running for Louisville’s Metro Council is Charged with Attempted Murder
author: Anthony
sentences: Activist Quintez Brown, 21, was just charged with attempted murder and four other counts of endangerment after Brown was reportedly linked to the attempted shooting of Democratic mayoral candidate Craig Greenberg.According to LMPD, Brown allegedly fired multiple shots into Craig Greenberg’s campaign office on Monday.
A Louisville BLM activist has just been identified by the Louisville Metro Police Department as the suspect in the attempted shooting of mayoral candidate Craig Greenberg.
The police report would state Greenberg was unharmed but a bullet did graze his clothing.
